 all i am saying. that is why i

s it? For you to say "who

end is absurd. so..
for you and everyone to know a little about me...

oct =

technology for a =
few years now. i have been doing paranormal
investigations for 19 years now=

you popped up on the scene.) Now i'=
m back and hitting it hard again
and want to be able to use the best equipm=
ent that money can't buy.

Frank doesn't even pretend to be an expert nor d=
oes he expect his name
to be mentioned every time an article is published. =
anyways.. i
probably said more than i should have already.

bear... i'm up =
for that duel.. sounds fun...lol best one wins a
"certificate of expertific=
ation" sign by the us president... lol

btw.. one rule bear... no cutting a=
nd pasting clips together to make
one up. haha

--jon
